text: The 1974 Campeonato Nacional de Fútbol Profesional was the Chilean football top tier’s 42nd season. Huachipato was the tournament’s champion. It was its first ever top-level title. ==Standing== ==Scores== ==Top goalscorers== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Rank ! Name ! Club ! Goals |- | align=center | 1 | Julio Crisosto |Colo-Colo |align=center| 28 |- | align=center | 2 | Juan Carlos Sarnari |Universidad de Chile |align=center| 24 |- | align=center | 3 | Carlos Sintas |Huachipato |align=center| 23 |- | align=center | 4 | Alberto Hidalgo |Palestino |align=center| 20 |- | align=center | 5 | Sergio Ahumada |Unión Española |align=center| 17 |- |} ==Liguilla Pre-Copa Libertadores== \---- \---- ===Final play-off=== Unión Española also qualified for the 1975 Copa Libertadores ==See also== * 1974 Copa Chile ==References== ==External links== *ANFP Category:Primera División de Chile seasons Chile Prim
title: 1974 Primera División de Chile
